name: Axe 'n' Bash Deluxe
description:
The core gameplay of Axe 'n' Bash, the hit game by Vince Alan in which you chop down trees whilst dealing with the chaos of nature, now with two more levels and more features!

Attack trees and other objects to collect points! A tree is worth 100 points, other objects are worth 10 points. 2800 points are required to win a level.

Use your mouse to navigate the menu, then use arrow keys + ctrl in game to control the player character. Press space to enter/exit the boat, which is controlled with tank controls.
